text: Šmarca (; Leksikon občin kraljestev in dežel zastopanih v državnem zboru, vol. 6: Kranjsko. 1906. Vienna: C. Kr. Dvorna in Državna Tiskarna, p. 30.) is a settlement just south of Kamnik, on the right bank of the Kamnik Bistrica River, in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. The settlement was first mentioned in documents dating to 1359. The parish church in the settlement is dedicated to Saint Maurice.Šmarca web site ==References== ==External links== *Šmarca at Geopedia * Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Šmarca
